t: Identifying the Imposter Brands!
s: March 13, 2021 - When fake brands try to imitate a certain brand, they tend to make mistakes in the spelling or the tagline or even on the description of a certain item. When looking for a certain product, one should make sure they read and check the product description thoroughly to avoid getting cheated.

t: Scammers Stole $660 Million Last Year Posing as Workers at Amazon and Other Big Brands
s: May 29, 2024 - Often posing as representatives from Best Buy’s Geek Squad, Amazon, PayPal and several other big brand names, fraudsters stole over $660 million through business-impersonation schemes in 2023 alone, according to a new report from the Federal Trade Commission.

t: What to Know About the Latest Amazon-Impostor Scams

t: The Latest on Amazon Imposter Scams
s: June 27, 2024 - Criminals love to impersonate big businesses and the bigger the better. One of the largest targets of impostor scams last year was Amazon. According to the Federal Trade Commission, 44,000 reports about scammers using Amazon's name were filed last year, with $19 million reported lost.

t: Amazon tops list of impersonated businesses | Federal Trade Commission
s: August 18, 2022 - 4 Prior to the increase in reports of Amazon impersonators, Social Security Administration impersonation scams were the most frequently reported imposter scam. From July 2020 through June 2021, reports about Social Security Administration impersonators totaled 80,797.
